: : Darkangel : :
Darkangel: Oh, Tyrael. He is out on a mission right now. I'm sure he'll return soon.
 "Nic <wingedwarrior41@...>" <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:The lady laughed of a light laughter.

Dreadplague: Relax, Angel! I know perfectly where I am. We are on the
Tripredacus warship "Oblivion's Grasp". Let's just say that I consider
Major Tyrael as my father since he created me. Now... (she glared at
him in the eyes) Where can I find him?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Darkangel : :
> Darkangel: Who is your father? I have to warn you, you may not be
where you were before getting into that pod.
>  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" <wingedwarrior41@h...>
wrote:Dreadplague: Thank you! (She looks around) Do you know where my
father
> is? There is something I want to ask of him.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > 
> > : : Darkangel : : 
> > As her cloak moved away, he saw that, although armed, this femme was
> very pretty. 
> > Darkangel: I'm Darkangel. It's nice to meet you Dreadplague. Well at
> least it's been nice sense wakeing up from stasis. 
> > He chuckled at this. 
> > Darkangel: Welcome to the Tripredacus base. 
> >  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote: ???: I'm
> glad you are okay. I am Dreadplague. Let me show myself, though.
> > 
> > Her cloak moved and retreated to form a cape in her back. She was now
> > herself, Dreadplague.
> > 
> > She looked like a regular Techno-organic, but she was different enough
> > to be able to notice she was not simply that. Armor piece covered her
> > scaly body. Her face was gray and dark purple, but so pretty. She wore
> > a wicked lokking sword at her side.
> > 
> > Dreadplague: I am sorry I made you panic. I did not know you were
> > here, and less that you were a friendly. What is your name?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > > 
> > > : : Darkangel : : 
> > > Darkangel came out of stasis lock, as the pain cleared from his
> > head. He started to get to his feet when he realized that a soft,
> > soothing voice had just asked if was ok. 
> > > Darkangel opened his optics to see a femme bot standing over him. He
> > stood up, faceing her. 
> > > Darkangel: I think I'll be ok. That's quite an ability you have
> > there. What's your name? 
> > >  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote: The pod
> > opened silently and darkness seemed to fill the room. A tall
> > > and dark cloaked figure stepped out of it, its feet clicking as they
> > > met the ground. The figure had no face, but it saw Darkangel on the
> > > floor. It went near and immediatly realized it was emitting its wave
> > > of panic. It stopped at once.
> > > 
> > > ???: Are you all right?
> > > 
> > > It passed a hand over Darkangel's head, instantly stopping the
> > > panic-induced stasis lock.
> > > 
> > > ???: Forgive me, I did not realize my capacities.
> > > 
> > > Surprisingly, the voice was soft. It was that of a female, but the
> > > figure seemed to belie the possibility of anything but fear.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...>
wrote:
> > > > 
> > > > : : Darkangel : : 
> > > > Darkangel was paying attention to the computer and did not notice
> > > the movement in the pod. 
> > > > Suddenly the wave from the new bot struck, and Darkangel's
eyes grew
> > > wide and bright. He seemed to start sweating immediatly. His hands
> > > went to his head, and it became obvious he was in pain. 
> > > > Darkangel: Ahhhhh! What the hell is wrong with me?! 
> > > > The bat bot fell to the ground in stasis. The wave had knocked him
> > out. 
> > > >  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote: Inside
> > > the pod, something began to move. The file had not been totally
> > > > uploaded, but it was not an essential part. The protoform was now
> > > > fully awake and knew what was happening around.
> > > > 
> > > > More out of instinct than by real malevolence, it sent a wave of
> > > > distress on Darkangel's mind. It could freeze him in place and
leave
> > > > him shaking, but the effects were variable depending on many
> factors.
> > > > However, it was a disturbing sensation that would likely leave him
> > > > restless.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...>
> wrote:
> > > > > 
> > > > > : : Darkangel : : 
> > > > > He recieved the comm message from Tyrael, and opened a return
> > > channel. 
> > > > > Darkangel: Understood. I'll begin work on this right away. 
> > > > > Darkangel got the pod he had returned with ans set it up in
a lab,
> > > > connected to the computer system. First he got the black
> canister and
> > > > unloaded it's contents into the pod, so it would be part of the
> > > > protoform. That was easy. Now Darkangel was at the keyboards
running
> > > > through millions of files looking for the correct one. 
> > > > > Finally after about ten minutes he found Burrock.dna on the
> system.
> > > > He selected the file and began to upload it into the pod. The
> computer
> > > > said it would take twenty minutes to complete the upload. 
> > > > > Darkangel: Ok, I guess I'll be here for a while... 
> > > > >  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
Tyrael
> > > > opened a frequency with Darkangel.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Tyrael: Darkangel, this is Tyrael. I want you to create this new
> > bot I
> > > > > was talking about, since I can't be there right now. Go into
> the lab
> > > > > with a blank stasis pod and download the Burrock.DNA file in it.
> > Then,
> > > > > include the black canister to its composition. Contact me when
> > our new
> > > > > soldier is born.
> > > > > 
> > > > >

> > Service.

Service.
